snippet: PETA said the event, which featured pyrotechnics, was “inherently stressful” for the animals, and it criticized the Penguins team and the Pittsburgh Zoo....

headline.main: PETA Condemns N.H.L.’s Use of Real Penguins in Pittsburgh Pregame Show
headline.print_headline: Activists Condemn the Use of Live Penguins

lead_paragraph: PETA said the event, which featured pyrotechnics, was “inherently stressful” for the animals, and it criticized the Penguins team and the Pittsburgh Zoo.
